content.text:
# 14th Golden Raspberry Awards

The 14th Golden Raspberry Awards were held on March 20, 1994, at the Hollywood Roosevelt Hotel to recognize the worst the movie industry had to offer in 1993.
Winners and Nominees
File:Burt Reynolds 1991 portrait crop.jpg|Burt Reynolds, Worst Actor winner.
File:Madonna by David Shankbone cropped.jpg|Madonna, Worst Actress winner.
File:Woody Harrelson October 2016.jpg|Woody Harrelson, Worst Supporting Actor winner.
File:Faye Dunaway - 1971 - PBS.JPG|Faye Dunaway, Worst Supporting Actress winner.
File:JanetJacksonUnbreakableTourSanFran2015.jpg|Janet Jackson, Worst New Star winner.

|"Big Gun" from Last Action Hero, written by Angus Young and Malcolm Young
|-
|"(You Love Me) In All the Right Places" from Indecent Proposal, music by John Barry, lyrics by Lisa Stansfield, Ian Devaney & Andy Morris
